member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis
member.summary: 用于对信号的抖动分析

summary.para: Measure the high and low level and amplitude of the input signal.
Chinese Simplified: 测量输入信号的高低电平和幅度。

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Level.MeasureReferenceLevel(SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.StateLevels,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.ReferenceLevelsSettings)

summary.para: Measure the reference level according to the state level.
Chinese Simplified: 根据状态电平测量参考电平。

member.param: 状态电平输入，可以通过MeasureStateLevels方法获得
参考电平设置，包括高电平、中间电平和低电平，单位为百分比
member.returns: 实际输出的参考电平绝对值

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Level.MeasureReferenceLevel(System.Double[],SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.StateLevelsSettings,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.ReferenceLevelsSettings)

summary.para: Calculate the reference level according to the input signal.
Chinese Simplified: 根据输入信号计算参考电平。

member.returns: 实际输出的参考电平绝对值

summary.para: Measure the boundary and direction of each transition in the signal according to the set reference level.
Chinese Simplified: 根据设定的参考电平测量信号中每个跃迁的边界和方向。
Select the corresponding edge according to the transition direction.
Chinese Simplified: 根据跃迁方向选择对应的边沿。
Measure the index and amplitude of overshoot and undershoot.
Chinese Simplified: 测量过冲和下冲发生的位置和幅度。
Measure the maximum and minimum voltage at each transition in the signal.
Chinese Simplified: 测量信号中每个跃迁处的最大和最小电压。
Measure the peak to peak value of each cycle in the signal.
Chinese Simplified: 测量信号中每个周期的峰峰值。

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Level.MeasureArea(System.Double[],SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings,System.Double[]@,System.Double[]@,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.Slope)

summary.para: Measure the area and average value of each cycle of the signal.
Chinese Simplified: 测量信号每个周期的面积和平均值。

member.param: 信号中每个周期占据面积
信号中每个周期的平均值

summary.para: Measure the voltage RMS of each cycle in the signal.
Chinese Simplified: 测量信号中每个周期的电压有效值。

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Timing.FindLevelCrossings(System.Double[],System.Double,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.Transition[],System.Double)

summary.para: Measure the index of crossing point for the specified voltage.
Chinese Simplified: 测量指定电压穿越点的位置。

member.param: 采样点的时间间隔，等于采样率的倒数

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Timing.MeasureRiseTime(SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.Transition[],System.Double)

summary.para: Measure the rise time of signal transition.
Chinese Simplified: 测量信号跃迁的上升时间

member.param: 采样点的时间间隔，等于采样率的倒数

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Timing.MeasureFallTime(SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.Transition[],System.Double)

summary.para: Measure the fall time of signal transition.
Chinese Simplified: 测量信号跃迁的下降时间

member.param: 采样点的时间间隔，等于采样率的倒数

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Timing.MeasurePeriod(SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings)

summary.para: Measure the period for signal with uniform transition distribution.
Chinese Simplified: 对跃迁分布均匀的信号，测量周期

member.returns: 每个周期的时间，也表示相邻的同一个方向跃迁的时间差

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Timing.MeasureDutyCycle(SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings,System.Double[]@,System.Double[]@,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.Slope)

summary.para: Measure the duty cycle of the signal.
Chinese Simplified: 测量信号的占空比。

member.param: 每个周期高于穿越电平的时间百分比
每个周期低于穿越电平的时间百分比

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Timing.MeasurePositiveWidth(SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings)

summary.para: Measure the pulse duration of the rising transition (positive pulse width or high level).
Chinese Simplified: 测量上升跃迁（正脉宽或者高电平）的脉冲持续时间。

member.returns: 从上升高于穿越电平到下降低于穿越电平的时间，单位为秒

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Timing.MeasureNegativeWidth(SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings)

summary.para: Measure the pulse duration of the falling transition (negative pulse width or low level).
Chinese Simplified: 测量下降跃迁（负脉宽或者低电平）的脉冲持续时间。

member.returns: 从下降低于穿越电平到上升高于穿越电平的时间，单位为秒

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Timing.MeasureBurstWidth(System.Double[],System.Double,System.Int32[]@,System.Int32[]@,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)

summary.para: Measure the duration of the burst signal in the input signal.
The burst signal starts at a certain edge and passes through a certain threshold level,
ends at the next edge and passes through this threshold level again, and lasts for more than the specified time.
Chinese Simplified: 测量信号中突发信号的持续时间，突发信号起始于某个边沿穿过某阈值电平，结束于下一个边沿再次穿过此阈值电平，并持续超过最小指定时间。

member.param: 采样点的时间间隔，等于采样率的倒数
突发信号起始位置索引集合
突发信号结束位置索引集合
突发信号最短的持续时间
member.returns: 每个突发信号的持续时间，单位为秒

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Timing.MeasureSetupHoldTime(SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings,System.Double[]@,System.Double[]@)

summary.para: Measure the establishment time and holding time of the signal.
Chinese Simplified: 测量信号的建立时间和保持时间。

member.param: 原始信号的穿越电平位置
参考信号（时钟信号）的穿越电平位置
参考信号跃迁前的原始信号建立时间
参考信号跃迁后的原始信号保持时间

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Timing.ChannelSkew(SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.Slope)

summary.para: Measure the time delay (skewness) between two signals.
Chinese Simplified: 测量两个信号之间的延时（偏度）。

member.param: 原始信号的穿越电平位置
参考信号（时钟信号）的穿越电平位置
信号中的第一个跃迁方向

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Timing.MeasurePhase(SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Utility.PhaseUnit,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.Slope)

summary.para: Measure the phase difference of each cycle between two signals.
Chinese Simplified: 测量两个信号每个周期的相位差。

member.param: 原始信号的穿越电平位置
参考信号（时钟信号）的穿越电平位置
信号中的第一个跃迁方向

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.ClockRecovery.MeanClock(SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings@,System.Int16[]@,System.Double)

summary.para: Recover the reference clock signal from the input signal.
Chinese Simplified: 从输入信号中恢复参考时钟信号。

member.param: 输入信号的电平穿越位置
参考时钟的电平穿越位置
参考时钟的数据位序列
预期的参考时钟单位间隔，默认为-1

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.ClockRecovery.ConvertBitCountToBitstream(System.Int16[],SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.Slope)

summary.para: Convert the bit number information of each transition in the signal into a bit stream sequence per unit time.
Chinese Simplified: 把信号中每个跃迁的比特数量信息转换为每个单位时间的比特流序列。

member.param: 接连跃迁中的比特数量数组，通过ClockRecovery方法获取
member.returns: 信号在每个单位间隔内的高低电平序列，由0和1组成

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.ClockRecovery.CreateReferenceBitWaveform(System.Double[],System.Double,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings)

summary.para: Create an ideal reference clock waveform synchronized with the input signal.
Chinese Simplified: 创建与输入信号同步的理想的参考时钟波形。

member.param: 采样点的时间间隔，等于采样率的倒数
参考时钟的电平穿越位置
member.returns: 参考时钟信号序列，由0和1组成

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Jitter.MeasureTimeIntervalError(SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings,System.Double[]@,System.Double[]@,System.Int16[])

summary.para: Measure the time difference between the level crossing position of the original signal and the level crossing position of the corresponding reference clock signal.
Chinese Simplified: 测量原始信号的电平穿越位置和对应的参考时钟信号的电平穿越位置的时间差。

member.param: 参考时钟信号信号的电平穿越
测量误差位置的索引集合
接连跃迁中的比特数量数组

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Jitter.MeasurePeriodJitter(SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings,System.Double[]@,System.Double[]@)

summary.para: Measure the difference between each cycle of the original signal and the corresponding reference clock signal.
Chinese Simplified: 测量原始信号和对应参考时钟信号的每个周期的差值。

member.param: 原始信号的穿越电平位置
参考时钟信号信号的电平穿越
原始信号和参考时钟信号每个周期的时间误差
测量误差位置的索引集合

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Jitter.MeasuereDutyCycleDistortion(SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings,System.Double@,System.Double@,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.Slope)

summary.para: Measure signal the duty cycle distortion that represents the average difference between the positive and negative pulse widths of the signal.
Chinese Simplified: 测量信号的占空比失真，表示信号正负脉宽的平均差值。

member.param: 原始信号的穿越电平位置
正负脉宽持续时间的平均差值

summary.para: Measure the difference between adjacent elements of the sequence.
Chinese Simplified: 计算序列相邻元素的差值

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.Jitter.MeasurePhaseNoise(System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double@,System.Double[]@,System.Double@)

summary.para: Measure the signal phase noise of the jitter that is the sum of RMS of adjacent frequency components in the frequency domain.
Chinese Simplified: 测量抖动信号的相位噪声，也就是频域中相邻频率分量的RMS之和

member.param: 时间间隔，即采样率的倒数
计算相位噪声的开始频率
计算相位噪声的结束频率
指定频段内的相位噪声，单位为s rms

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.JitterAnalysis.ArrayMax``1(``0[])
member.summary: 返回数组中最大值所在的索引

member.summary: 构造函数，设置默认参数

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.StateLevelsSettings.Method
member.summary: 计算方式，默认值为直方图

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.StateLevelsSettings.HistogramSize
member.summary: 直方图中bin的数量，默认值为256，当Method为Peak时会被忽略

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.StateLevelsSettings.PercentLevel
member.summary: 指定上下限的分界百分比，默认值为0.45，不能大于0.5，当Method为Peak时会被忽略

member.summary: 构造函数，设置默认参数

member.summary: 参考电平单位，默认为百分比

member.summary: 跃迁开始处穿过高参考电平或者低参考电平的索引位置

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.Transition.EndIndex
member.summary: 跃迁结束处穿过高参考电平或者低参考电平的索引位置

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings.Indexes
member.summary: 穿越点电平位置的索引集合

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.LevelCrossings.Slope

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.OvershootUndershoot.OvershootSequence
member.summary: 过冲序列，大小等于过冲量占幅度的百分比

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.OvershootUndershoot.UndershootSequence
member.summary: 下冲序列，大小等于下冲量占幅度的百分比

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.MeasurementInfo.PulseReferenceLevel
member.summary: The pulse reference level of measurement

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.HighLowStateSetting.Method
member.summary: Method to computes the high and low state levels of the waveform

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.HighLowStateSetting.HistogramSize
member.summary: The number of bins in the histogram uses to determine the high and low state levels of the waveform. Ignored for the peak method.

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.HighLowStateMethod
member.summary: The method used to determine the high and low state levels of a waveform.

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.HighLowStateMethod.Auto
member.summary:
Determines whether the histogram bins that correspond to the high and low state levels each have over 5% of the total hits.
If so, returns those results.
Otherwise, uses the peak method.
This ensures a reasonable answer for either a square wave (ignoring the overshoot and undershoot) or a triangle wave (where a histogram fails).

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.HighLowStateMethod.Peak
member.summary: Searches the entire waveform for its maximum and minimum levels.

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.HighLowStateMethod.Histogram
member.summary: Returns the levels of the histogram bins with the maximum number of hits in the upper and lower regions of the waveform. The upper and lower regions of the waveform include the upper and lower 40%, respectively, of the peak-to-peak range of the waveform.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.PulseMeasurementInfo.PulseReferenceLevel
member.summary: The reference level of pulse measurement

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.PulsePolarity
member.summary: polarity defines a pulse as high (default) or low.

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.PulsePolarity.High
member.summary: A high pulse consists of the interval between a rising mid ref level crossing and the next falling mid ref level crossing.

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.PulsePolarity.Low
member.summary: A low pulse consists of the interval between a falling mid ref level crossing and the next rising mid ref level crossing.

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.PulseReferenceLevel.Unit
member.summary: The unit of pulse reference level

member.name: P:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.PulseReferenceLevel.PercentageLevelSetting
member.summary: The method used to determine the high and low state levels of a waveform. If you select percent ref units, percent level settings determines the reference levels. Otherwise, ignored.

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.PulseReferenceUnit
member.summary: The enum for unit of pulse reference level

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.PulseReferenceUnit.Percentage
member.summary: The pulse reference level is in percentage

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Measurements.PulseReferenceUnit.Absolute
member.summary: The pulse reference level is in absolute value

summary.para: Squarewave measurements class
Chinese Simplified：方波测量类
According to the setting of high and low levels, analyze the amplitude and the level of high/low levels of multiple waveform.
Chinese Simplified：根据高低电平的设置，分析多个波形的幅度，高低电平等级。
According to the setting of high and low levels, analyze the amplitude and the level of high/low levels of a single waveform.
Chinese Simplified：根据高低电平的设置，分析单个波形的幅度，高低电平等级。
Analyze the period, duty cycle and pulse width of multiple waveform according to the settings of high and low level, polarity and reference level.
Chinese Simplified：根据高低电平，极性和参考电平设置，分析单个波形的周期，占空比，脉宽。

param.name: percentageLevelSetting
param.para: The level setting for percentage reference level
Chinese Simplified：百分比参考电平配置

summary.para: Analyze the period, duty cycle and pulse width of a single waveform according to the settings of high and low level, polarity and reference level.
Chinese Simplified：根据高低电平，极性和参考电平设置，分析单个波形的周期，占空比，脉宽。

param.name: dt
param.para: The sample interval in second of input waveform
Chinese Simplified：输入波形的采样间隔

param.name: percentageLevelSetting
param.para: The level setting for percentage reference level
Chinese Simplified：百分比参考电平配置

summary.para: Measure the period, pulse width and duty cycle of the specified pulse of each waveform according to the settings of high and low level, polarity and reference level.
Chinese Simplified：根据高低电平，极性和参考电平设置，测量每个波形指定序号脉冲的周期，脉宽和占空比。

param.name: dt
param.para: The sample interval in second of input waveform
Chinese Simplified：输入波形的采样间隔

param.name: percentageLevelSetting
param.para: The level setting for percentage reference level
Chinese Simplified：百分比参考电平配置

param.name: polarity
param.para: Chinese Simplified：要测量的波形极性

param.name: pulseNumber
param.para: The pulse number specifies which pulse of polarity, high or low, to be measured.(1-based)
Chinese Simplified：要测量的脉冲的序号（从1开始）

param.name: periods
param.para: The time between adjacent middle ref level crossings in the same direction in seconds.
Chinese Simplified：两个相邻的中间参考电平的时间（单位秒）

param.name: measurementInfos
param.para: The pulse-center time of the selected pulse and the absolute reference levels uses to define the measurement cycle.

summary.para: Measure the period, pulse width and duty cycle of the specified pulse of waveform according to the settings of high and low level, polarity and reference level.
Chinese Simplified：根据高低电平，极性和参考电平设置，测量波形指定序号脉冲的周期，脉宽和占空比。

param.name: dt
param.para: The sample interval in second of input waveform
Chinese Simplified：输入波形的采样间隔

param.name: percentageLevelSetting
param.para: The level setting for percentage reference level
Chinese Simplified：百分比参考电平配置

param.name: polarity
param.para: Chinese Simplified：要测量的波形极性

param.name: pulseNumber
param.para: The pulse number specifies which pulse of polarity, high or low, to be measured.(1-based)
Chinese Simplified：要测量的脉冲的序号（从1开始）

param.name: period
param.para: The time between adjacent middle ref level crossings in the same direction in seconds.
Chinese Simplified：两个相邻的中间参考电平的时间（单位秒）

param.name: measurementInfo
param.para: The pulse-center time of the selected pulse and the absolute reference levels uses to define the measurement cycle.

summary.para: Measure the RMS and mean value of the specified period of each waveform according to the high and low level, polarity and reference level settings.
Chinese Simplified：根据高低电平，极性和参考电平设置，测量每个波形指定周期的RMS和均值

param.name: dt
param.para: The sample interval in second of input waveform
Chinese Simplified：输入波形的采样间隔

param.name: percentageLevelSetting
param.para: The level setting for percentage reference level
Chinese Simplified：百分比参考电平配置

param.name: cycleNumber
param.para: The cycle number specifies which cycle be measured.(1-based)
Chinese Simplified：要测量的周期的序号（从1开始）

param.name: rmsResults
param.para: The cycle RMS results for each waveform.
Chinese Simplified：每个波形对应的RMS结果

param.name: meanResults
param.para: The cycle mean results for each waveform.
Chinese Simplified：每个波形对应的Mean结果

param.name: measurementInfos
param.para: The pulse-center time of the selected pulse and the absolute reference levels uses to define the measurement cycle.

summary.para: Measure the RMS and mean value of all period for each waveform according to the high and low level, polarity and reference level settings.
Chinese Simplified：根据高低电平，极性和参考电平设置，测量每个波形所有周期的RMS和均值

param.name: dt
param.para: The sample interval in second of input waveform
Chinese Simplified：输入波形的采样间隔

param.name: percentageLevelSetting
param.para: The level setting for percentage reference level
Chinese Simplified：百分比参考电平配置

param.name: rmsResults
param.para: The cycle RMS results every cycle for each waveform.
Chinese Simplified：每个波形对应的每个周期的RMS结果

param.name: meanResults
param.para: The cycle mean results of every cycle for each waveform.
Chinese Simplified：每个波形对应的每个周期的Mean结果

param.name: measurementInfos
param.para: The pulse-center time of the selected pulse and the absolute reference levels uses to define the measurement cycle.

summary.para: Measure the RMS and mean value of all period according to the high and low level, polarity and reference level settings.
Chinese Simplified：根据高低电平，极性和参考电平设置，测量波形所有周期的RMS和均值

param.name: dt
param.para: The sample interval in second of input waveform
Chinese Simplified：输入波形的采样间隔

param.name: percentageLevelSetting
param.para: The level setting for percentage reference level
Chinese Simplified：百分比参考电平配置

param.name: rmsResults
param.para: The cycle RMS results for each cycle.

param.name: meanResults
param.para: The cycle mean results for each cycle.

param.name: measurementInfos
param.para: The pulse-center time of the selected pulse and the absolute reference levels uses to define the measurement cycle.

summary.para: Measure the RMS and mean value of specified period according to the high and low level, polarity and reference level settings.
Chinese Simplified：根据高低电平，极性和参考电平设置，测量波形指定周期的RMS和均值

param.name: dt
param.para: The sample interval in second of input waveform
Chinese Simplified：输入波形的采样间隔

param.name: percentageLevelSetting
param.para: The level setting for percentage reference level
Chinese Simplified：百分比参考电平配置

param.name: cycleNumber
param.para: The cycle number specifies which cycle be measured.(1-based)
Chinese Simplified：要测量的周期的序号（从1开始）

param.name: rmsResult
param.para: The cycle RMS results for each waveform.

param.name: meanResult
param.para: The cycle mean results for each waveform.

param.name: measurementInfo
param.para: The pulse-center time of the selected pulse and the absolute reference levels uses to define the measurement cycle.

summary.para: According to the high and low level, polarity and reference level settings, measure the slope , rise and fall time and other transition information of the specified edge for each waveform.
Chinese Simplified：根据高低电平，极性和参考电平设置，测量每个波形指定边沿的斜率，上升、下降时间等信息。

param.name: dt
param.para: The sample interval in second of input waveform
Chinese Simplified：输入波形的采样间隔

param.name: percentageLevelSetting
param.para: The level setting for percentage reference level
Chinese Simplified：百分比参考电平配置

param.name: polarity
param.para: Chinese Simplified：待测量的边沿类型

param.name: edgeNumber
param.para: The edge number to be measured
Chinese Simplified：待测量的边沿编号

param.name: slopes
param.para: Chinese Simplified：每个边沿对应的斜率结果

param.name: transitionDurations
param.para: Chinese Simplified：每个边沿的上升/下降时间

param.name: measurementInfos
param.para: The pulse-center time of the selected pulse and the absolute reference levels uses to define the measurement cycle.

summary.para: According to the high and low level, polarity and reference level settings, measure the slope , rise and fall time and other transition information of the specified edge.
Chinese Simplified：根据高低电平，极性和参考电平设置，测量波形指定边沿的斜率，上升、下降时间等信息。

param.name: dt
param.para: The sample interval in second of input waveform
Chinese Simplified：输入波形的采样间隔

param.name: percentageLevelSetting
param.para: The level setting for percentage reference level
Chinese Simplified：百分比参考电平配置

param.name: polarity
param.para: Chinese Simplified：待测量的边沿类型

param.name: edgeNumber
param.para: The edge number to be measured
Chinese Simplified：待测量的边沿编号

param.name: slope
param.para: Chinese Simplified：边沿对应的斜率结果

param.name: transitionDuration
param.para: Chinese Simplified：边沿的上升/下降时间

param.name: measurementInfo
param.para: The pulse-center time of the selected pulse and the absolute reference levels uses to define the measurement cycle.
